text: Un flic (; also known as Dirty Money) is a 1972 French Italian crime thriller movie directed by Jean-Pierre Melville and starring Alain Delon, Catherine Deneuve, Richard Crenna, Michael Conrad, Paul Crauchet. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1972 crime thriller movies Category:French crime movies Category:French thriller movies Category:Italian crime movies Category:Italian thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Jean-Pierre Melville
title: Un flic
